Name: Gs. Aguazul Sierra Norte Group
description:
Elly is a hard-working and responsible person. She lives in a community called Aguazul Sierra which belongs to the municipality of Santa Cruz de Yoyoa Cortes. She lives with her family. She has been making a living cultivating yuca (a root crop) and coffee for three years obtaining very good crops and generating good income.

Elly is requesting a loan to plant plots of yuca and she has to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and organic manure. She also wants to renovate her coffee plot so that she can sell it later for a good price and recover what she invested.

Elly's dream is to be a good farmer and that her crops sell well.

She requests the loan in group form with the following people: Donaldo and Geidy who live in the community of Aguazul Sierra and make a living growing yuca.

Pe√±a Blanca, Honduras, January of 2017
